DataElement.preferredName: Person Quality of Life Complete Agreement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: indicator related to a person agreeing to complete a quality of life questionnaire, an evaluatio of an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Quality of Life Complete Agreement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person agreeing to complete a quality of life questionnaire, an evaluatio of an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

Property.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredName: Quality of Life Form Completed Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes if form is completed for quality of life.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
